- Achieve a passing score on Google Ads Search Certification, Google Analytics Individual Qualification, and HubSpot Email Marketing Certification.

Achieving this badge recognizes successful completion of the Trauma-Invested Teaching Practices and Policies Certificate program at UNC Charlotte. With this badge, participants will increase their knowledge about trauma and how trauma impacts students’ academic and developmental success, learn classroom management interventions to support struggling students, explore current policies and procedures and identify the policies and procedures that support/hinder students who have experienced trauma.

entity.name: UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all four modules, pass quizzes with at least 80% passing. Quizzes are based on readings, videos, and lectures.

b4cc54f4-6566-4d90-a4c3-47ec7b9111d4.description: During this program, you’ll gain an overview of the fundamentals of sustainable development and dynamics of marine conservation. You’ll cover concepts encountered in the field and issues such as governing marine biodiversity, sustainable management of fisheries, marine protected areas, endangered species, coral reefs, and marine pollution and plastics. Your fieldwork component will allow you to gain unique and valuable insight through a series of masterclasses, site visits and a final project.
b4cc54f4-6566-4d90-a4c3-47ec7b9111d4.name: Marine Conservation Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

entity.name: UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: The program is made up of 8 online courses and a fieldwork component. The 8 courses include: Context Analysis and Practice, Marine Conservation, Community Engagement, Impact Measurement, Communication and Advocacy, Project Management and Delivery, Finance and Fundraising, Best Practices and Innovation. The program duration is 80 hours for the online courses component and 160 hours for the fieldwork component.

c70ac98d-0842-4771-85fb-9b8b5aeca353.description: During this program, you will develop an understanding of key concepts and tools used to analyze a local economy, as well as an understanding of global social economic development challenges and solutions. You will discover the history and evolution of sustainable development and be introduced to the latest developments and current core debates. Your fieldwork component will allow you to gain unique and valuable insight through a series of masterclasses, site visits and a final project.
c70ac98d-0842-4771-85fb-9b8b5aeca353.name: Social Economic Development Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

entity.name: UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: The program is made up of 8 online courses and a fieldwork component. The 8 courses include: Context Analysis and Practice, Social Economic Development, Community Engagement, Impact Measurement, Communication and Advocacy, Project Management and Delivery, Finance and Fundraising, Best Practices and Innovation. The program duration is 80 hours for the online courses component and 160 hours for the fieldwork component.

810f835e-dca0-4403-8d18-84d4bb0a6a50.description: During this program, you'll gain an understanding of key concepts and terminology, tools to analyze an energy system, and knowledge of global climate problems and solutions. You will learn about the main drivers of climate change, and explore case studies illustrating bold and innovative approaches to climate change issues from leading organizations. Your fieldwork component will allow you to gain unique and valuable insight through a series of masterclasses, site visits and a final project.
810f835e-dca0-4403-8d18-84d4bb0a6a50.name: Climate Crisis and Clean Energy Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

The program duration is 80 hours for the online courses component and 160 hours for the fieldwork component.

bd8b1aee-81fa-402b-a78d-21adb8ad33f1.description: The holder of this Community Engagement credential completed the urbanCORE Community Engagement Pathway. This Pathway encourages students to enhance academic learning with community-based social impact experiences while cultivating and articulating their civic identity and their broader personal and professional purpose.
bd8b1aee-81fa-402b-a78d-21adb8ad33f1.name: Community Engagement

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

entity.name: UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

alignments.name: Bonner Program Learning Outcomes Rubric
alignments.description: Projects and reflections are assessed by urbanCORE using the BONNER PROGRAM LEARNING OUTCOMES RUBRIC * (drawing on rubrics developed and piloted by AAC&U and the Massachusetts Department of Higher Education while adapted to fit the four-year developmental structure of the Bonner Program).

badge_template_activities.title: Students earning the Community Engagement credential have completed the following: 20 hours of community engagement in the greater Charlotte community, five online learning modules and related reflections (Charlotte Overview, Civic Identity, Intercultural Competency, Entrepreneurial Thinking, and Community-Based Research), an approved semester-long community engagement project, and documentation of this project in our e-portfolio system

a25fc055-5218-45f3-9989-e6c15b9774a6.description: The activities included in these modules will allow students to gain a better understanding of and identified customer. The exercises and activities are centered around the most critical stage of impact and innovation, the opportunity assessment, done through industry research and interviews. Students will also have the opportunity to choose from a number of professional development sessions that range from a patent and licensing workshop to networking panels.
a25fc055-5218-45f3-9989-e6c15b9774a6.name: Customer Discovery

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

24860eed-01e0-40fd-9652-49df8bae1cf5.description: During this program, you’ll get to grips with why education is fundamental to development and growth, and familiarize yourself with key concepts and ideologies related to education. You’ll learn about different education systems and analyze the barriers to access, and the roles and responsibilities of different stakeholders in decreasing exclusion. Your fieldwork component will allow you to gain unique and valuable insight through a series of masterclasses, site visits and a final project.
24860eed-01e0-40fd-9652-49df8bae1cf5.name: Education for Development Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

The program duration is 80 hours for the online courses component and 160 hours for the fieldwork component.

a5c43900-2216-475b-b543-bcfd4623349b.description: This leadership development program provides a toolkit on how to direct and manage, the importance of decision making and communication, best practices for managing their time and prioritizing tasks as well as the key principles of people management.
a5c43900-2216-475b-b543-bcfd4623349b.name: Emerging Leaders Certificate

2c757b4f-659c-4933-9c25-d4fa8c9c43c6.description: During this program, you’ll review the history and evolution of the concept of sustainable development. You’ll examine the ways in which corporations have changed their response to addressing social and environmental challenges such as climate crisis, human rights, social inequality, pollution and the transition to a circular economy. Your fieldwork component will allow you to gain unique and valuable insight through a series of masterclasses, site visits and a final project.
2c757b4f-659c-4933-9c25-d4fa8c9c43c6.name: Environmental and Corporate Sustainability Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

6ef1fa4e-b61d-403b-89d1-e75f67283072.name: Foundations of Climate Crisis and Clean Energy

b92236aa-2107-4958-9a3c-52044b0dddfd.description: During this program, you’ll get to grips with why education is fundamental to development and growth, and familiarize yourself with key concepts and ideologies related to education. In the process, you’ll learn about different education systems as well as analyze the barriers to access, and the roles and responsibilities of different stakeholders in decreasing exclusion. You’ll also explore case studies illustrating innovative approaches for solving global education issues.
b92236aa-2107-4958-9a3c-52044b0dddfd.name: Foundations of Education for Development

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

The program duration is 80 hours.

d13f0e1e-f545-478c-8594-56af2d99e5f2.description: During this program, you’ll review the history and evolution of the concept of sustainable development. You’ll examine the ways in which corporations have changed their response to addressing social and environmental challenges such as climate crisis, human rights, social inequality, pollution and the transition to a circular economy. You’ll learn about the business cases that drive this response, and review case studies that illustrate innovative approaches to different global issues.
d13f0e1e-f545-478c-8594-56af2d99e5f2.name: Foundations of Environmental & Corporate Sustainability

The program duration is 80 hours.

e6d875c3-5462-49f8-bf3f-5979fbb6eaae.description: During this program, you will develop an understanding of key concepts and tools used to analyze a health system, as well as a better understanding of global health challenges and solutions. You will learn about universal health coverage and explore case studies illustrating bold and innovative approaches to global health issues.
e6d875c3-5462-49f8-bf3f-5979fbb6eaae.name: Foundations of Global Public Health

The program duration is 80 hours.

b5317f72-bc0a-48a3-ac84-26ad44655412.description: During this program, you'll develop an understanding of key concepts and terminology, tools to analyze avenues to access justice for human rights violations, and knowledge of global human rights challenges and different approaches through case studies from around the world. You will learn about the broad range of human rights issues such as economic, social and cultural rights; civil and political rights; women’s rights; indigenous rights; disability and human rights; and children's rights.
b5317f72-bc0a-48a3-ac84-26ad44655412.name: Foundations of Human Rights & Access to Justice

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

5e974fd9-3099-4655-9f06-3f7da2575076.description: During this program, you’ll gain an overview of the fundamentals of sustainable development and wildlife conservation. In the process, you’ll learn about the key concepts you’ll encounter in the field, and gain insight into the dynamics of the wildlife conservation industry. You will learn about the driving forces behind the decline of wildlife biodiversity, and explore case studies illustrating different approaches to global conservation issues from a variety of organizations.
5e974fd9-3099-4655-9f06-3f7da2575076.name: Foundations of Wildlife Conservation

39c29c78-c4f3-44cc-b751-274bba699f80.description: The Global Engagement Scholar program provides students global and intercultural competencies useful in the global workplace. Employers are looking for graduates that are able to work in interculturally diverse contexts. The skills acquired while completing this pathway program will provide students with competencies that you will be able to highlight on your resume and LinkedIn. You will gain knowledge, skills and an appreciation of different cultural perspectives from around the world.
39c29c78-c4f3-44cc-b751-274bba699f80.name: Global Engagement Scholars Program

issuer.summary: issued by UNC Charlotte School of Professional Studies

8475c866-25c9-41d1-a420-69ffd878dba4.description: The Growth for Small Business Certificate is awarded after successful completion of our 8-week course which provides business owners with expertise in key digital marketing domains. 79381891-4451-4419-9442-4cf31e67f161.description: This certificate program equips leaders to effectively manage their work and relationships to be more productive in their organizations. This program teaches leaders how to use inspiration rather than fear to enhance their team’s performance, shows them how to empower teams to operate toward common goals and gets results that are critical to the success of the organization.
79381891-4451-4419-9442-4cf31e67f161.name: Leadership Development Certificate

8027dd99-2a8b-4546-95a3-0d0baad33f0b.description: The Sales Development Science Certificate is awarded after successful completion of our 10-week course which provides professionals with a foundational understanding of strategies and tactics for developing, managing, and converting sales leads and pipeline into revenue. The course is taught by leading industry practitioners and supplemented with live/online mentor-led sessions. This Certificate acknowledges the successful completion of 10 Salesforce Trailhead badges.
8027dd99-2a8b-4546-95a3-0d0baad33f0b.name: Sales Development Science Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Course completion. Full participation is expected. Time Commitment You should expect to spend four to six hours each week completing assignments engaging with content created by industry experts, including hands-on activities and assignments in the online learning portal (LMS). Additionally, optional (but recommended) weekly live/online, mentor-led roundtables (one hour) are available for engaging live/online.
- Students must receive a 70% or higher on all end-of-module assessments.
- Earn 10 Salesforce Trailhead badges.
- Successful completion of a strategic playbook.

1be714dc-3aaf-4eae-bb78-dd5cc032f610.description: The Sales Leadership program applies the core competencies identified in the Leadership Development Program (LDP) to the capabilities needed to guide a sales team. This program helps create a functional understanding of developing a competitive advantage, leading with emotional intelligence, coaching a sales team, promoting value-added selling and implementing best practices and strategies when negotiating.
1be714dc-3aaf-4eae-bb78-dd5cc032f610.name: Sales Leadership Certificate

7c842e8d-93d0-4790-ac07-fe62e4804e49.description: Through the Social Impact, Innovation and Entrepreneurship Credential students will gain entrepreneurial thinking skills, research and interview stakeholders and launch their idea through integrative and iterative learning. Students will participate in customer discovery, design thinking, storytelling, innovation and collaboration. The skills learned through this program are instrumental in assisting students in making an impact and can be transferable to any career choice.
7c842e8d-93d0-4790-ac07-fe62e4804e49.name: Social Impact, Innovation and Entrepreneurship
